name: MLSoundClassifier.DataSource.features(table:featureColumn:labelColumn:parameters:)
desc: Creates a data source from a data table of audio features.
declaration: case features(table: MLDataTable, featureColumn: String = __Defaults.featureColumnName, labelColumn: String = __Defaults.labelColumnName, parameters: MLSoundClassifier.FeatureExtractionParameters = FeatureExtractionParameters())
